pages.text: $(li)The Endolocator is an upgrade of the $(l:patchouli:tools/alexsmobs/echolocator)Echolocator$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to find the location of the End Portal Room in $(l:patchouli:structures/stronghold)Strongholds$(/l) but it doesn't works in $(l:patchouli:structures/end_castle)End Castles$(/l) or $(l:patchouli:structures/end_gate)End Gates$(/l).
